FILLER.Name: dbpath
FILLER.Desc: Data storing path

FILLER.Name: port
FILLER.Desc: Sets the TCP port the server listens on.

FILLER.Name: allow_system_table_mods
FILLER.Desc: Allows modifications of the structure of system tables.

FILLER.Name: application_name
FILLER.Desc: Sets the application name to be reported in statistics and logs.

FILLER.Name: archive_command
FILLER.Desc: Sets the shell command that will be called to archive a WAL file.

FILLER.Name: archive_mode
FILLER.Desc: Allows archiving of WAL files using archive_command.

FILLER.Name: archive_timeout
FILLER.Desc: Forces a switch to the next xlog file if a new file has not been started within N seconds.

FILLER.Name: array_nulls
FILLER.Desc: Enable input of NULL elements in arrays.

FILLER.Name: authentication_timeout
FILLER.Desc: Sets the maximum allowed time to complete client authentication.

FILLER.Name: autovacuum
FILLER.Desc: Starts the autovacuum subprocess.

FILLER.Name: autovacuum_analyze_scale_factor
FILLER.Desc: Number of tuple inserts, updates, or deletes prior to analyze as a fraction of reltuples.

FILLER.Name: autovacuum_analyze_threshold
FILLER.Desc: Minimum number of tuple inserts, updates, or deletes prior to analyze.

FILLER.Name: autovacuum_freeze_max_age
FILLER.Desc: Age at which to autovacuum a table to prevent transaction ID wraparound.

FILLER.Name: autovacuum_max_workers
FILLER.Desc: Sets the maximum number of simultaneously running autovacuum worker processes.

FILLER.Name: autovacuum_multixact_freeze_max_age
FILLER.Desc: Multixact age at which to autovacuum a table to prevent multixact wraparound.

FILLER.Name: autovacuum_naptime
FILLER.Desc: Time to sleep between autovacuum runs.

FILLER.Name: autovacuum_vacuum_cost_delay
FILLER.Desc: Vacuum cost delay in milliseconds, for autovacuum.

FILLER.Name: autovacuum_vacuum_cost_limit
FILLER.Desc: Vacuum cost amount available before napping, for autovacuum.

FILLER.Name: autovacuum_vacuum_scale_factor
FILLER.Desc: Number of tuple updates or deletes prior to vacuum as a fraction of reltuples.

FILLER.Name: autovacuum_vacuum_threshold
FILLER.Desc: Minimum number of tuple updates or deletes prior to vacuum.

FILLER.Name: backslash_quote
FILLER.Desc: Sets whether "\'" is allowed in string literals.

FILLER.Name: bgwriter_delay
FILLER.Desc: Background writer sleep time between rounds.

FILLER.Name: bgwriter_lru_maxpages
FILLER.Desc: Background writer maximum number of LRU pages to flush per round.

FILLER.Name: bgwriter_lru_multiplier
FILLER.Desc: Multiple of the average buffer usage to free per round.

FILLER.Name: bonjour
FILLER.Desc: Enables advertising the server via Bonjour.

FILLER.Name: bonjour_name
FILLER.Desc: Sets the Bonjour service name.

FILLER.Name: bytea_output
FILLER.Desc: Sets the output format for bytea.

FILLER.Name: check_function_bodies
FILLER.Desc: Check function bodies during CREATE FUNCTION.

FILLER.Name: checkpoint_completion_target
FILLER.Desc: Time spent flushing dirty buffers during checkpoint, as fraction of checkpoint interval.

FILLER.Name: checkpoint_segments
FILLER.Desc: Sets the maximum distance in log segments between automatic WAL checkpoints.

FILLER.Name: checkpoint_timeout
FILLER.Desc: Sets the maximum time between automatic WAL checkpoints.

FILLER.Name: checkpoint_warning
FILLER.Desc: Enables warnings if checkpoint segments are filled more frequently than this.

FILLER.Name: client_encoding
FILLER.Desc: Sets the client's character set encoding.

FILLER.Name: client_min_messages
FILLER.Desc: Sets the message levels that are sent to the client.

FILLER.Name: commit_delay
FILLER.Desc: Sets the delay in microseconds between transaction commit and flushing WAL to disk.

FILLER.Name: commit_siblings
FILLER.Desc: Sets the minimum concurrent open transactions before performing commit_delay.

FILLER.Name: config_file
FILLER.Desc: Sets the server's main configuration file.

FILLER.Name: constraint_exclusion
FILLER.Desc: Enables the planner to use constraints to optimize queries.

FILLER.Name: cpu_index_tuple_cost
FILLER.Desc: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each index entry during an index scan.

FILLER.Name: cpu_operator_cost
FILLER.Desc: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each operator or function call.

FILLER.Name: cpu_tuple_cost
FILLER.Desc: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each tuple (row).

FILLER.Name: cursor_tuple_fraction
FILLER.Desc: Sets the planner's estimate of the fraction of a cursor's rows that will be retrieved.

FILLER.Name: data_directory
FILLER.Desc: Sets the server's data directory.

FILLER.Name: DateStyle
FILLER.Desc: Sets the display format for date and time values.

FILLER.Name: db_user_namespace
FILLER.Desc: Enables per-database user names.

FILLER.Name: deadlock_timeout
FILLER.Desc: Sets the time to wait on a lock before checking for deadlock.

FILLER.Name: debug_assertions
FILLER.Desc: Turns on various assertion checks.

FILLER.Name: debug_pretty_print
FILLER.Desc: Indents parse and plan tree displays.

FILLER.Name: debug_print_parse
FILLER.Desc: Logs each query's parse tree.

FILLER.Name: debug_print_plan
FILLER.Desc: Logs each query's execution plan.

FILLER.Name: debug_print_rewritten
FILLER.Desc: Logs each query's rewritten parse tree.

FILLER.Name: default_statistics_target
FILLER.Desc: Sets the default statistics target.

FILLER.Name: default_tablespace
FILLER.Desc: Sets the default tablespace to create tables and indexes in.

FILLER.Name: default_text_search_config
FILLER.Desc: Sets default text search configuration.

FILLER.Name: default_transaction_deferrable
FILLER.Desc: Sets the default deferrable status of new transactions.

FILLER.Name: default_transaction_isolation
FILLER.Desc: Sets the transaction isolation level of each new transaction.

FILLER.Name: default_transaction_read_only
FILLER.Desc: Sets the default read-only status of new transactions.

FILLER.Name: default_with_oids
FILLER.Desc: Create new tables with OIDs by default.

FILLER.Name: dynamic_library_path
FILLER.Desc: Sets the path for dynamically loadable modules.

FILLER.Name: effective_cache_size
FILLER.Desc: Sets the planner's assumption about the size of the disk cache.

FILLER.Name: effective_io_concurrency
FILLER.Desc: Number of simultaneous requests that can be handled efficiently by the disk subsystem.

FILLER.Name: enable_bitmapscan
FILLER.Desc: Enables the planner's use of bitmap-scan plans.

FILLER.Name: enable_hashagg
FILLER.Desc: Enables the planner's use of hashed aggregation plans.

FILLER.Name: enable_hashjoin
FILLER.Desc: Enables the planner's use of hash join plans.

FILLER.Name: enable_indexonlyscan
FILLER.Desc: Enables the planner's use of index-only-scan plans.

FILLER.Name: enable_indexscan
FILLER.Desc: Enables the planner's use of index-scan plans.

FILLER.Name: enable_material
FILLER.Desc: Enables the planner's use of materialization.

FILLER.Name: enable_mergejoin
FILLER.Desc: Enables the planner's use of merge join plans.

FILLER.Name: enable_nestloop
FILLER.Desc: Enables the planner's use of nested-loop join plans.

FILLER.Name: enable_seqscan
FILLER.Desc: Enables the planner's use of sequential-scan plans.

FILLER.Name: enable_sort
FILLER.Desc: Enables the planner's use of explicit sort steps.

FILLER.Name: enable_tidscan
FILLER.Desc: Enables the planner's use of TID scan plans.

FILLER.Name: escape_string_warning
FILLER.Desc: Warn about backslash escapes in ordinary string literals.

FILLER.Name: event_source
FILLER.Desc: Sets the application name used to identify PostgreSQL messages in the event log.

FILLER.Name: exit_on_error
FILLER.Desc: Terminate session on any error.

FILLER.Name: external_pid_file
FILLER.Desc: Writes the postmaster PID to the specified file.

FILLER.Name: extra_float_digits
FILLER.Desc: Sets the number of digits displayed for floating-point values.

FILLER.Name: from_collapse_limit
FILLER.Desc: Sets the FROM-list size beyond which subqueries are not collapsed.

FILLER.Name: fsync
FILLER.Desc: Forces synchronization of updates to disk.

FILLER.Name: full_page_writes
FILLER.Desc: Writes full pages to WAL when first modified after a checkpoint.

FILLER.Name: geqo
FILLER.Desc: Enables genetic query optimization.

FILLER.Name: geqo_effort
FILLER.Desc: GEQO: effort is used to set the default for other GEQO parameters.

FILLER.Name: geqo_generations
FILLER.Desc: GEQO: number of iterations of the algorithm.

FILLER.Name: geqo_pool_size
FILLER.Desc: GEQO: number of individuals in the population.

FILLER.Name: geqo_seed
FILLER.Desc: GEQO: seed for random path selection.

FILLER.Name: geqo_selection_bias
FILLER.Desc: GEQO: selective pressure within the population.

FILLER.Name: geqo_threshold
FILLER.Desc: Sets the threshold of FROM items beyond which GEQO is used.

FILLER.Name: gin_fuzzy_search_limit
FILLER.Desc: Sets the maximum allowed result for exact search by GIN.

FILLER.Name: hba_file
FILLER.Desc: Sets the server's "hba" configuration file.

FILLER.Name: hot_standby
FILLER.Desc: Allows connections and queries during recovery.

FILLER.Name: hot_standby_feedback
FILLER.Desc: Allows feedback from a hot standby to the primary that will avoid query conflicts.

FILLER.Name: ident_file
FILLER.Desc: Sets the server's "ident" configuration file.

FILLER.Name: ignore_checksum_failure
FILLER.Desc: Continues processing after a checksum failure.

FILLER.Name: ignore_system_indexes
FILLER.Desc: Disables reading from system indexes.

FILLER.Name: IntervalStyle
FILLER.Desc: Sets the display format for interval values.

FILLER.Name: join_collapse_limit
FILLER.Desc: Sets the FROM-list size beyond which JOIN constructs are not flattened.

FILLER.Name: krb_caseins_users
FILLER.Desc: Sets whether Kerberos and GSSAPI user names should be treated as case-insensitive.

FILLER.Name: krb_server_keyfile
FILLER.Desc: Sets the location of the Kerberos server key file.

FILLER.Name: krb_srvname
FILLER.Desc: Sets the name of the Kerberos service.

FILLER.Name: lc_messages
FILLER.Desc: Sets the language in which messages are displayed.

FILLER.Name: lc_monetary
FILLER.Desc: Sets the locale for formatting monetary amounts.

FILLER.Name: lc_numeric
FILLER.Desc: Sets the locale for formatting numbers.

FILLER.Name: lc_time
FILLER.Desc: Sets the locale for formatting date and time values.

FILLER.Name: lo_compat_privileges
FILLER.Desc: Enables backward compatibility mode for privilege checks on large objects.

FILLER.Name: local_preload_libraries
FILLER.Desc: Lists shared libraries to preload into each backend.

FILLER.Name: lock_timeout
FILLER.Desc: Sets the maximum allowed duration of any wait for a lock.

FILLER.Name: log_autovacuum_min_duration
FILLER.Desc: Sets the minimum execution time above which autovacuum actions will be logged.

FILLER.Name: log_checkpoints
FILLER.Desc: Logs each checkpoint.

FILLER.Name: log_connections
FILLER.Desc: Logs each successful connection.

FILLER.Name: log_destination
FILLER.Desc: Sets the destination for server log output.

FILLER.Name: log_directory
FILLER.Desc: Sets the destination directory for log files.

FILLER.Name: log_disconnections
FILLER.Desc: Logs end of a session, including duration.

FILLER.Name: log_duration
FILLER.Desc: Logs the duration of each completed SQL statement.

FILLER.Name: log_error_verbosity
FILLER.Desc: Sets the verbosity of logged messages.

FILLER.Name: log_executor_stats
FILLER.Desc: Writes executor performance statistics to the server log.

FILLER.Name: log_file_mode
FILLER.Desc: Sets the file permissions for log files.

FILLER.Name: log_filename
FILLER.Desc: Sets the file name pattern for log files.

FILLER.Name: log_hostname
FILLER.Desc: Logs the host name in the connection logs.

FILLER.Name: log_line_prefix
FILLER.Desc: Controls information prefixed to each log line.

FILLER.Name: log_lock_waits
FILLER.Desc: Logs long lock waits.

FILLER.Name: log_min_duration_statement
FILLER.Desc: Sets the minimum execution time above which statements will be logged.

FILLER.Name: log_min_error_statement
FILLER.Desc: Causes all statements generating error at or above this level to be logged.

FILLER.Name: log_min_messages
FILLER.Desc: Sets the message levels that are logged.

FILLER.Name: log_parser_stats
FILLER.Desc: Writes parser performance statistics to the server log.

FILLER.Name: log_planner_stats
FILLER.Desc: Writes planner performance statistics to the server log.

FILLER.Name: log_rotation_age
FILLER.Desc: Automatic log file rotation will occur after N minutes.

FILLER.Name: log_rotation_size
FILLER.Desc: Automatic log file rotation will occur after N kilobytes.

FILLER.Name: log_statement
FILLER.Desc: Sets the type of statements logged.

FILLER.Name: log_statement_stats
FILLER.Desc: Writes cumulative performance statistics to the server log.

FILLER.Name: log_temp_files
FILLER.Desc: Log the use of temporary files larger than this number of kilobytes.

FILLER.Name: log_timezone
FILLER.Desc: Sets the time zone to use in log messages.

FILLER.Name: log_truncate_on_rotation
FILLER.Desc: Truncate existing log files of same name during log rotation.

FILLER.Name: logging_collector
FILLER.Desc: Start a subprocess to capture stderr output and/or csvlogs into log files.

FILLER.Name: maintenance_work_mem
FILLER.Desc: Sets the maximum memory to be used for maintenance operations.

FILLER.Name: max_connections
FILLER.Desc: Sets the maximum number of concurrent connections.

FILLER.Name: max_files_per_process
FILLER.Desc: Sets the maximum number of simultaneously open files for each server process.

FILLER.Name: max_locks_per_transaction
FILLER.Desc: Sets the maximum number of locks per transaction.

FILLER.Name: max_pred_locks_per_transaction
FILLER.Desc: Sets the maximum number of predicate locks per transaction.

FILLER.Name: max_prepared_transactions
FILLER.Desc: Sets the maximum number of simultaneously prepared transactions.

FILLER.Name: max_stack_depth
FILLER.Desc: Sets the maximum stack depth, in kilobytes.

FILLER.Name: max_standby_archive_delay
FILLER.Desc: Sets the maximum delay before canceling queries when a hot standby server is processing archived WAL data.

FILLER.Name: max_standby_streaming_delay
FILLER.Desc: Sets the maximum delay before canceling queries when a hot standby server is processing streamed WAL data.

FILLER.Name: max_wal_senders
FILLER.Desc: Sets the maximum number of simultaneously running WAL sender processes.

FILLER.Name: password_encryption
FILLER.Desc: Encrypt passwords.

FILLER.Name: post_auth_delay
FILLER.Desc: Waits N seconds on connection startup after authentication.

FILLER.Name: pre_auth_delay
FILLER.Desc: Waits N seconds on connection startup before authentication.

FILLER.Name: quote_all_identifiers
FILLER.Desc: When generating SQL fragments, quote all identifiers.

FILLER.Name: random_page_cost
FILLER.Desc: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of a nonsequentially fetched disk page.

FILLER.Name: restart_after_crash
FILLER.Desc: Reinitialize server after backend crash.

FILLER.Name: search_path
FILLER.Desc: Sets the schema search order for names that are not schema-qualified.

FILLER.Name: seq_page_cost
FILLER.Desc: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of a sequentially fetched disk page.

FILLER.Name: session_replication_role
FILLER.Desc: Sets the session's behavior for triggers and rewrite rules.

FILLER.Name: shared_buffers
FILLER.Desc: Sets the number of shared memory buffers used by the server.

FILLER.Name: shared_preload_libraries
FILLER.Desc: Lists shared libraries to preload into server.

FILLER.Name: sql_inheritance
FILLER.Desc: Causes subtables to be included by default in various commands.

FILLER.Name: ssl
FILLER.Desc: Enables SSL connections.

FILLER.Name: ssl_ca_file
FILLER.Desc: Location of the SSL certificate authority file.

FILLER.Name: ssl_cert_file
FILLER.Desc: Location of the SSL server certificate file.

FILLER.Name: ssl_ciphers
FILLER.Desc: Sets the list of allowed SSL ciphers.

FILLER.Name: ssl_crl_file
FILLER.Desc: Location of the SSL certificate revocation list file.

FILLER.Name: ssl_key_file
FILLER.Desc: Location of the SSL server private key file.

FILLER.Name: ssl_renegotiation_limit
FILLER.Desc: Set the amount of traffic to send and receive before renegotiating the encryption keys.

FILLER.Name: standard_conforming_strings
FILLER.Desc: Causes '...' strings to treat backslashes literally.

FILLER.Name: statement_timeout
FILLER.Desc: Sets the maximum allowed duration of any statement.

FILLER.Name: stats_temp_directory
FILLER.Desc: Writes temporary statistics files to the specified directory.

FILLER.Name: superuser_reserved_connections
FILLER.Desc: Sets the number of connection slots reserved for superusers.

FILLER.Name: synchronize_seqscans
FILLER.Desc: Enable synchronized sequential scans.

FILLER.Name: synchronous_commit
FILLER.Desc: Sets the current transaction's synchronization level.

FILLER.Name: synchronous_standby_names
FILLER.Desc: List of names of potential synchronous standbys.

FILLER.Name: syslog_facility
FILLER.Desc: Sets the syslog "facility" to be used when syslog enabled.

FILLER.Name: syslog_ident
FILLER.Desc: Sets the program name used to identify PostgreSQL messages in syslog.

FILLER.Name: tcp_keepalives_count
FILLER.Desc: Maximum number of TCP keepalive retransmits.

FILLER.Name: tcp_keepalives_idle
FILLER.Desc: Time between issuing TCP keepalives.

FILLER.Name: tcp_keepalives_interval
FILLER.Desc: Time between TCP keepalive retransmits.

FILLER.Name: temp_buffers
FILLER.Desc: Sets the maximum number of temporary buffers used by each session.

FILLER.Name: temp_file_limit
FILLER.Desc: Limits the total size of all temporary files used by each session.

FILLER.Name: temp_tablespaces
FILLER.Desc: Sets the tablespace(s) to use for temporary tables and sort files.

FILLER.Name: TimeZone
FILLER.Desc: Sets the time zone for displaying and interpreting time stamps.

FILLER.Name: timezone_abbreviations
FILLER.Desc: Selects a file of time zone abbreviations.

FILLER.Name: trace_notify
FILLER.Desc: Generates debugging output for LISTEN and NOTIFY.

FILLER.Name: trace_recovery_messages
FILLER.Desc: Enables logging of recovery-related debugging information.

FILLER.Name: trace_sort
FILLER.Desc: Emit information about resource usage in sorting.

FILLER.Name: track_activities
FILLER.Desc: Collects information about executing commands.

FILLER.Name: track_activity_query_size
FILLER.Desc: Sets the size reserved for pg_stat_activity.query, in bytes.

FILLER.Name: track_counts
FILLER.Desc: Collects statistics on database activity.

FILLER.Name: track_functions
FILLER.Desc: Collects function-level statistics on database activity.

FILLER.Name: track_io_timing
FILLER.Desc: Collects timing statistics for database I/O activity.

FILLER.Name: transaction_deferrable
FILLER.Desc: Whether to defer a read-only serializable transaction until it can be executed with no possible serialization failures.

FILLER.Name: transaction_isolation
FILLER.Desc: Sets the current transaction's isolation level.

FILLER.Name: transaction_read_only
FILLER.Desc: Sets the current transaction's read-only status.

FILLER.Name: transform_null_equals
FILLER.Desc: Treats "expr=NULL" as "expr IS NULL".

FILLER.Name: unix_socket_directories
FILLER.Desc: Sets the directories where Unix-domain sockets will be created.

FILLER.Name: unix_socket_group
FILLER.Desc: Sets the owning group of the Unix-domain socket.

FILLER.Name: unix_socket_permissions
FILLER.Desc: Sets the access permissions of the Unix-domain socket.

FILLER.Name: update_process_title
FILLER.Desc: Updates the process title to show the active SQL command.

FILLER.Name: vacuum_cost_delay
FILLER.Desc: Vacuum cost delay in milliseconds.

FILLER.Name: vacuum_cost_limit
FILLER.Desc: Vacuum cost amount available before napping.

FILLER.Name: vacuum_cost_page_dirty
FILLER.Desc: Vacuum cost for a page dirtied by vacuum.

FILLER.Name: vacuum_cost_page_hit
FILLER.Desc: Vacuum cost for a page found in the buffer cache.

FILLER.Name: vacuum_cost_page_miss
FILLER.Desc: Vacuum cost for a page not found in the buffer cache.

FILLER.Name: vacuum_defer_cleanup_age
FILLER.Desc: Number of transactions by which VACUUM and HOT cleanup should be deferred, if any.

FILLER.Name: vacuum_freeze_min_age
FILLER.Desc: Minimum age at which VACUUM should freeze a table row.

FILLER.Name: vacuum_freeze_table_age
FILLER.Desc: Age at which VACUUM should scan whole table to freeze tuples.

FILLER.Name: vacuum_multixact_freeze_min_age
FILLER.Desc: Minimum age at which VACUUM should freeze a MultiXactId in a table row.

FILLER.Name: vacuum_multixact_freeze_table_age
FILLER.Desc: Multixact age at which VACUUM should scan whole table to freeze tuples.

FILLER.Name: wal_buffers
FILLER.Desc: Sets the number of disk-page buffers in shared memory for WAL.

FILLER.Name: wal_keep_segments
FILLER.Desc: Sets the number of WAL files held for standby servers.

FILLER.Name: wal_level
FILLER.Desc: Set the level of information written to the WAL.

FILLER.Name: wal_receiver_status_interval
FILLER.Desc: Sets the maximum interval between WAL receiver status reports to the primary.

FILLER.Name: wal_receiver_timeout
FILLER.Desc: Sets the maximum wait time to receive data from the primary.

FILLER.Name: wal_sender_timeout
FILLER.Desc: Sets the maximum time to wait for WAL replication.

FILLER.Name: wal_sync_method
FILLER.Desc: Selects the method used for forcing WAL updates to disk.

FILLER.Name: wal_writer_delay
FILLER.Desc: WAL writer sleep time between WAL flushes.

FILLER.Name: work_mem
FILLER.Desc: Sets the maximum memory to be used for query workspaces.

FILLER.Name: xmlbinary
FILLER.Desc: Sets how binary values are to be encoded in XML.

FILLER.Name: xmloption
FILLER.Desc: Sets whether XML data in implicit parsing and serialization operations is to be considered as documents or content fragments.

FILLER.Name: zero_damaged_pages
FILLER.Desc: Continues processing past damaged page headers.
